properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 1 at 4:01AM EST until February 2 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Small Craft Advisory, which is in effect from 4 AM to 4 PM EST
Sunday.

* WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 knots tonight veering west on Sunday.

* WAVES...3 to 5 feet tonight and Sunday, then subsiding to 2 to 4
feet Sunday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY
